section.heading: Possession of disposable containers prohibited; exceptions.

annoGroup.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (225 day) addition, see § 3 of Omnibus Sports Consolidation Act of 1994 Temporary Amendment Act of 1995 (D.C. Law 11-67, October 26, 1995, law notification 42 DCR 6172).

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary addition (90 days) of section, see § 3 of the Omnibus Sports Consolidation Act of 1994 Emergency Amendment Act of 1995 (D.C. Act 11-102, July 21, 1995, 42 DCR 4009).

annoGroup.heading: Transfer of Functions
annoGroup.annotation: Section 19(a) of D.C. Law 10-152 provided that the Sports Commission shall assume all nonmilitary functions of the Armory board as are set forth in § 2-306 repealed .

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.text: Effect of dissolution of Sports Commission: See note to § 3-321.
Construction of Law 10-152: See note to § 3-321.
